high_descs: Turn right and walk towards the brown side-table.
Turn right and pick up the book that is on the edge of the bed.
Turn left and walk towards the brown cabinet.
Turn on the lamp that is on top of the brown cabinet.
anns.task_desc: Pick up the book from the bed and turn on the lamp on top of the cabinet.

high_descs: walk to face table at foot of bed
anns.task_desc: turn on lamp with book in hand

high_descs: turn right and walk over to the right side of the bed, but turn left to face that left side of the bed
grab the closest book to you off of the bed called "DEEP LEARNING"
turn left and walk over to the small cabinet at the end of the room
turn on the lamp on top of the small cabinet
anns.task_desc: turn on a lamp while holding a book
